Today in County Clare, it's looking pretty quiet with 2 ft @12s W lines and a light 8 mph E wind. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 1 ft @12s W, still with an E breeze at 9 mph, keeping it on the small side. By the day after, we're down to 1 ft @4s WNW with a gentle 7 mph W wind, making it a flat day. Best: today.
